channel.title: The Honorable Jason Chaffetz
channel.description: The Honorable Jason Chaffetz U.S. Representative ­ Utah's Third District (Remarks as Prepared for Delivery)

item.title: America is in trouble. If you spent $1 million every day, it would take you almost 3,000 years to get to $1 trillion.
item.author: The Honorable Jason Chaffetz

item.title: We are now nearly $16 trillion in debt. Each day we pay more than $600 million in interest on that debt - and we deficit spend $3 billion a day.
item.author: The Honorable Jason Chaffetz

item.title: Excessive regulations choke businesses. Our tax code punishes success, discourages entrepreneurs, and stifles growth.
item.author: The Honorable Jason Chaffetz

item.title: President Obama's solution: more government and more taxes.
item.author: The Honorable Jason Chaffetz

item.title: This isn't the American Dream. Our nation isn't just one good tax increase away from prosperity.
item.author: The Honorable Jason Chaffetz

item.title: American success hasn't come from Czars, "Cash for Clunkers," endless bailouts, a limitless government credit card, or more taxes for more government.
item.author: The Honorable Jason Chaffetz

item.title: The American Dream was built on the sweat and blood of Americans who took pride and personal ownership in themselves and their country.
item.author: The Honorable Jason Chaffetz

item.title: When times were tough, generations before quietly rolled up their sleeves and built a stronger, more prosperous nation. The government didn't build it. They built it.
item.author: The Honorable Jason Chaffetz

item.title: America was built with hard work, dedication to principles, and a belief that success was predicated on liberty and ownership.
item.author: The Honorable Jason Chaffetz

item.title: Restoring the American Dream will require fiscal discipline, limited government, accountability, and a strong national defense.
item.author: The Honorable Jason Chaffetz

item.title: We need to make tough choices. We need leadership.
item.author: The Honorable Jason Chaffetz

item.title: We need to elect Mitt Romney and Paul Ryan. We need to believe in America again.
item.author: The Honorable Jason Chaffetz
